original: 曹純五千精騎三百餘里追擊於長坂坡，張飛令二十騎縱馬煙塵疑兵，據水喝斷當陽橋，追兵無人敢進前...
text: Cao Chun chased at Changbanpo with five thousand fine horses for more than three hundred miles, Zhang Fei ordered twenty horses to ride in the smoke to suspect soldiers, and broke the Dangyang Bridge according to the water, no one dared to advance...
